title: Mountain Products Inc. Recalls Pork Products Due to Misbranding and Undeclared Allergens
summary: WASHINGTON, April 12, 2016 Mountain Products Inc., a Lagrangeville, N.Y. establishment, is recalling approximately 467 pounds of bacon and pork sausage products due to misbranding and undeclared allergens, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The company formulated the...
